fields_of_interest: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Since its inception, S2 Grupo has been interested and involved in EU initiatives, especially those related to cybersecurity and R&D programs (i.e., H2020, FP7, European Cybersecurity inititatives, Horizon 2020 Cybersecurity cPPP Work Programme, etc.).
organisation_name: S2 GRUPO DE INNOVACIÓN EN PROCESOS ORGANIZATIVOS, S.L.U. (S2 Grupo)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Member of the European Cyber Security Organisation (ECSO) (https://www.ecs-org.eu/)
relevant_communication:
R&D and innovation granted projects covered by the H2020 and FP7 programs. 
 
ECSO Association Board of directors member (https://www.ecs-org.eu) 
ECSO represents the industry-led contractual counterpart to the European Commission for the implementation of the Cyber Security contractual Public-Private Partnership (cPPP). 
 
 
ECS cPPP Partnerhip Board member (https://www.ecs-org.eu/cppp) 
The Partnership Board is the formal communication channel between the European Commission and the ECSO Association to discuss the Horizon 2020 Cybersecurity cPPP Work Programme, the implementation of the overall R&I programme related topics and the monitoring of the cPPP commitments (Key Progress Indicators).
goals__remit:
S2 Grupo is a European cybersecurity and cyber intelligence company, developing and providing cutting-edge European technology solutions for APT detection, Security Operations Center management, Security Real-time monitoring and Event management, ICS cybersecurity and People-Centric security. S2 Grupo also provides Managed Security Services (MSS) through S2 Grupo CERT (FIRST and TF-CSIRT member) and Information security consultancy services. 
 
S2 Grupo provides high technical and quality services and solutions to customers in a wide range of sectors such as banking, finance and insurance, energy, Government (national, inter-governmental, regional and local), utilities, etc. Sectors in which information is especially sensitive. 
 
S2 Grupo operates in Europe, North and South America, and has offices in Valencia (HQ), Madrid and Barcelona within Spain, in Brussels (Belgium), Lisbon (Portugal), Bogotá (Colombia) and Ciudad de México (México).
